articles.author: Sounak Mukhopadhyay
articles.title: Black marketing of World Cup tickets: Kolkata Police summons Cricket Association of Bengal over allegation | Mint - Mint
articles.description: A police complaint was lodged against CAB and an online ticket booking portal over alleged black marketing of ICC World Cup 2023 tickets for the India-South Africa match on November 5.
articles.content: Kolkata Police, following a report alleging black marketing of tickets for the ICC World Cup 2023 match between India and South Africa on November 5, has summoned officials from the Cricket Associati… [+1914 chars]

articles.title: Nigeria, Africa | Diphtheria Outbreak - Emergency Appeal Operational Strategy (MDRNG037) - Nigeria - ReliefWeb
articles.description: Situation Report in English on Nigeria about Coordination, Health, Epidemic and more; published on 2 Nov 2023 by IFRC
articles.content:
Timeline
March 2023: IFRC allocates Disaster Response Emergency Funds (DREF) for 355,654 CHF to take early action to contain the outbreak.
